text: The realme 5 is a smartphone from the Chinese company realme. ==Specifications== ===Hardware=== The Realme 5 uses the octa-core 64-bit Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 AIE processor, capable of running at 2.0GHz max, paired with the Adreno 610 GPU. It is powered by a 5000mAh high-capacity battery. The front features a 6.5-inch HD+ (720x1600) display with Gorilla Glass 3+ protection. The device has three models available: 3GB RAM/32GB storage, 4 GB RAM/64 GB storage or 4 GB RAM/128 GB storage, and supports memory expansion up to 256GB via the microSD card slot. ===Camera=== The realme 5 has a quad camera setup that includes a 12-megapixel primary sensor with an aperture of f/1.8 on the main lens. The second is an 8-megapixel ultra-wide sensor, whereas the third and fourth are 2-megapixel sensors for depth and macro mode. The front camera is 13-megapixel s and has an AI beauty mode. The cameras are AI-enabled with scene detection to capture better photos. === Software === The realme 5 is equipped with the latest ColorOS 6.0.1 based on Android 9.0 (Pie) operating system, and has a customized spatial design and close-to-native interaction mode exclusive to realme. realme has developed the Dirac Power Sound small speaker sound quality optimization technology jointly with Dirac Research AB to enhance the audio. ==References== Category:Smartphones Category:Android (operating system) Category:Chinese brands Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2019 Category:Phones with multiple rear cameras
title: Realme 5
